full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: High Purity Germanium (HPGe) Radioisotope Identifiers
---

## Contract Details

* **Title (English)**: PR7896 - W6399-23LM18 - High Purity Germanium (HPGe) Radioisotope Identifier
* **Title (French)**: Dispositif d'identification des radio-isotopes du germanium de haute pureté (HPGe)
* **Reference Number**: WS4125358320-Doc4254382066
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4125358320
* **Tender Status**: Expiré
* **Trade Agreements**: Adhering to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Deadline

* **Publishied Date**: 2023-10-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-21, 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-10-30

## Tender Requirements

* **Maximum of nine** HPGe Radioisotope Identifiers will be purchased initially, with an option for up to eighteen additional units.
* **Delivery**: Ontario, Canada
* **Inclusions**: Manuals, training, spare parts, and in-service support

## Procurement Details

* **Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Public Authorities**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Chad Bellerdine (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Resources

* **Notice URL (English)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17716827?extsite=MTc3MTY4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Notice URL (French)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17716827?extsite=MTc3MTY4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
